subject: CONGRATULATIONS! !!!!
body: FROM:THE DESK OF THE PROMOTIONS MANAGER,INTERNATIONAL PROMOTIONS/PRIZE AWARD DEPARTMENT,REF: LP/26510460037/07BATCH: 24/00319/IPDThis is to inform you of the release of our 2007 E-MAIL PROMOTIONS in which e-mail addresses are picked randomly by software powered by the Internet. Eighteen email addresses were selected and you are lucky to be amongst them therefore making you one of winners of the sum of €955,600.00 ( NINE HUNDRED AND FIFTY FIVE THOUSAND SIX HUNDERD EUROS) in this category and you are to contact our Financial Controller with the information below for clearance.LOTTERIA PRIMITIVA PROMOTIONSMr.King LopezTel: +34 634 071 544Email to: agentlopez202@yahoo.esIn respect to claims, you are to forward the following details to (agentlopez202@yahoo.es)to enable him clear your file for immediate payment:1. NAME IN FULL:2. ADDRESS:3. NATIONALITY:4. AGE:5. SEX6. OCCUPATION:7. PHONE/FAX:8. COUNTRY OF RESIDENCE:9. EMAIL ADDRESS:Congratulation once again from all member of our staff and thank you for being part of our promotion program.Best regards,MRS. MARIA SANCHEZ.
